title: New From Process Type Foundry: Bryant
content:
Process Type Foundry announces the release of Bryant, a family of eight typefaces inspired by mechanical lettering kits sold to hobbyists in the 60s and 70s.   
   
 [http://www.processtypefoundry.com/Bryant.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020100633/http:/www.processtypefoundry.com/Bryant.html)   
   
Best Regards,   
Eric Olson
author: eolson
